name: rage

effect_entries.effect: Locks the user into this move.  Due to a bug, if this move misses, its accuracy drops to 1/256 as long as the user is still locked in.

effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Raises ATTACK if
the user is hit.

Raises ATTACK if
the user is hit.

Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
